      • onGround

        public boolean onGround(int x1,
                        int y1,
                        int x2,
                        int y2,
                        int type,
                        int subtype)
        Collision detection
        Parameters:
        x1 - platform x coordinate
        y1 - platform y coordinate
        x2 - platform ending x coordinate
        y2 - platform ending y coordinate
        type - platform type
        subtype - platform subtype (direction)
        Returns:
        true = the player is on the ground || false = the player is not on the ground
        See Also:
        More information on types
